items.title: General moaning has no place on Micro.Blog, sorry.
items.content_html: To be fair now my micro.blog is working so well is connecting to other services I will not moan about football and other general less wide issues here going forward. I don‚Äôt need to connect to Trolls. That‚Äôs what makes twitter rubbish. And not what the web is about. Sorry about that but I get worked up about football. I‚Äôll notify people on specific major miles stones at AFC Wimbledon as an owner but I‚Äôll keep my personal complaints to myself and not bore you to death üíÄ üëçüòú
Good to see Wigan Fans on twitter and attempt troll me hehehehe nice. üòú
